items.value: Bob always love to Smoke, may you can help him?

How are you Bro?
At the moment there is not much to do!
But every time you get me:
5x Joint

i can give you:
2x filled Wallets
1x Special Delivery (for Sergio)

If you collect 6x Special Delivery for Sergio, you get a Reward from him!
nothing else i can do for you?
i got the Joints for ya!
good to know... see you Bob!

Survive my best friend...
Maybe i have new tasks soon!
Check for Mod Updates to may get new Quests for me!

take care o7
i will get you something to smoke!

Fantastic, I've been waiting for that!
Come back if you got more Joints...

You got: 2x filled Wallet
1x Special Delivery Box (for Sergio, collect!)

you dont have 6x Joint inside your Inventory!
please come back as soon you got them...
